5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin Abu Qatadah that his father said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite when leading us in the first two Rak’ah of the Zuhr prayer, and sometimes he would recite such that we could hear the Verse.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجَهْرِ بِالآيَةِ أَحْيَانًا فِي صَلاَةِ الظُّهْرِ وَالْعَصْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Occasionally reciting a verse aloud for Zuhr and ‘Asr Prayers
